ReturnPolicy.Description:
• We want to ensure that you are completely satisfied with your purchase. If not, then please let us know before  
        leaving any feedback and allow us to work with you to completely resolve any issues that you might be facing.
• You can return the item for a full refund LESS shipping, within 14 days of item(s) receipt date.
• There is no restocking fee. 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed.
• To return an item, please click REQUEST A RETURN, within 7 days of item delivery. Please fill in the form and 
        submit it.
• All returns must reach us within 14 days after the item was delivered to you
• The item must be in the original condition and with the original tags attached
• We will issue a refund or send a replacement within 3 business days of delivery back to us
• Buyer pays return shipping Charges.
• We are open Monday through Friday, from 10 AM to 5 PM BST, except on Federal Holidays

Title: Adjustable Channel Set Brilliant Cut CZ Toe Ring Solid 10k White Gold
Description: VIVRE an eBay Online Store Adjustable Channel Set Brilliant Cut CZ Toe Ring Solid 10k White Gold Images shown are only for illustration purpose and not in Actual Size. SKU - BRAND: Vivre PRODUCT TYPE: Ring STYLE: Toe Ring METAL : White Gold METAL PURITY: 10k MAIN STONE: Cubic Zirconia STONE WT: 0.21 CT STONE CLARITY: Fine STONE COLOR: White STONE SHAPE: Round We accept payment via PayPal only. You can also pay using your credit card, via paypal, by using paypal as a guest. Payment is required immediately after sale of an item. Buyer Note : For customers in US the US postal service/customs charges an additional fee for all incoming international shipments, which will have to be paid by the customer. All orders (except custom made orders) will be shipped with in 10-12 business days. Custom made orders will be shipped within 2 weeks after cleared payment is received. All our DIAMOND jewelry is made to order. We will manufacture it after you purchase it from us. Please note that if you pay for expedited shipping on custom orders,the handling time is still 10 business days. Whenever the item ships, it will ship by the expedited service, if you have paid for it. Business days do not include Saturdays, Sundays and Federal Holidays. Please note that PayPal echecks take 5-7 business days to clear. Sizing:- All our items are made on order to make sure customer gets the new item with exact ring size. While making the payment customer need to mention the ring size on the "note to seller tab" or else can send separate message to us after making the payment. Delivery Time: Delivery within USA takes 4-12 business days after item is shipped. This depends on the mail service we send it by. Please note that we may ship via different mail services. Delivery to AK, HI, PR, APO/FPO addresses and other USA territories usually takes 4 to 6 weeks. Please note that the shipping service we use does not forward mails to your forwarding addresses. So please do not give such an address for shipping. International Shipments: International shipments are usually delivered within 2 to 6 weeks, depending on the time taken to clear customs. Please note that all countries charge a duty on imported goods. A customs clearing charge is also imposed in many countries. We are not responsible for the amount of duty or any other related charges We want to ensure that you are completely satisfied with your purchase. If not, then please let us know before leaving any feedback and allow us to work with you to completely resolve any issues that you might be facing. You can return the item for a full refund LESS shipping, within 14 days of item(s) receipt date. There is no restocking fee. 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed. All returns must reach us within 14 days after the item was delivered to you. The item must be in the original condition, without resized and with the original tags attached. We will issue a refund or re -send a replacement within 3-10 business days of delivery. Buyer pays return shipping. VIVRE, is focused to become leading Online Jewellery Service Provider. A brand backed by technical excellence in manufacturing since 22 years & since its inception, Vivre personifies ‘Panache’ & Luxury in diamonds & Jewellery. Using our virtual DNA, combined with Diamond customer service standards & with our network of global vendors, we offer perhaps an unsurpassed collection of Gems & Jewellery. Sparkling solitaires & precious diamond and gemstone jewellery leave our factories daily, to our delighted customers in more than 150+ cities globally. Our business model helps our customers save substantially over retail prices.Vivre is promoted by industry professionals who know the business we do our own manufacturing and are not just a re-seller like most online businesses. We have a dedicated call center to help customers. Our Parent Co. has been manufacturing Jewellery since 20 + years & our experience extend from USA to China in designs & manufacturing skills/inputs/vendors/expertise. All our Jewellery is 100% Authentic and genuine and of highest quality and checked before leaving factory. Please feel free to ask questions we are always happy to answer.
